wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Owen Wakelam (15 July 1955 – 31 March 2020) was a British molecular biologist, director of the Babraham Institute in Cambridge, England.

response: *Michael Wakelam (1955–2020), molecular biologist, director of the Babraham Institute in Cambridge, England.

LIPID MAPS was founded in 2003 with NIH funding. Since 2016, it has been a joint project between the University of Cardiff led by Prof Valerie O'Donnell, the Babraham Institute under Michael Wakelam, and UCSD scientists Shankar Subramaniam and Ed Dennis funded by the Wellcome Trust. Wakelam's obituary describes LIPID MAPS as unifying the field of lipidomics.
*Michael Wakelam, 64, British molecular biologist, COVID-19.Babraham Institute director Professor Michael Wakelam dies after suspected coronavirus infection
